name: Google Web Search
description: Google Web Search API. Search the world’s information, including webpages, related keywords and more.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
Search query. You can use Google Search parameters.

e.g. adele site:youtube.com
e.g. harry potter filetype:pdf
e.g. inurl:store
e.g. ronaldo -cristiano

parameters.name: related_keywords
parameters.description:
Shows related keywords. Default: false

Entering true, increases API latency

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max results number. Max recommended value is 300.
